of the obtuse and esoteric references department: Donald Rumsfeld 's adorable "didn't know" shenanigans reminded this columnist of the opening of "The Big Sleep," when Carmen Sternwood falls backwards. Philip Marlowe says: I had to catch her or let her crack her head on the tessellated floor. The mainstream media does for Donald Rumsfeld what Marlowe did for Carmen by unquestioningly accepting his disingenuous explanations. "Good boy, Rover!"
